content: As an AI language model, I don't have personal experiences or opinions. However, there are examples of corporations that are successfully managing conflicts with local communities over natural resource extraction. For example, BHP (formerly known as BHP Billiton) has a community engagement program to manage impacts on the community and the environment. The program involves community consultation, active listening, and addressing community concerns. Additionally, Barrick Gold developed a "Framework for Responsible Mining" that outlines the company's approach to managing its social and environmental impacts. These frameworks demonstrate how corporations can engage with local communities and address their concerns, promoting sustainable and mutually beneficial outcomes.
